title: Threat to Iraq's economy, additional sources

content.question: Which of the following additional pieces of information would be most directly useful in assessing the extent to which the developments reflected in Source 2 represent a threat to Iraq’s economy?

choices.label: Information on the total amount of foreign investment in Iraq’s economy
Information on the percentage of Iraqi agriculture that depends on irrigation
Information on the political affiliation of Iraq’s minister of water resources
Information on Iraq’s petroleum resources and revenues

content.answer: Information on the percentage of Iraqi agriculture that depends on irrigation
